metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4054 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PgBouncer before 1.5.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) by sending a password packet before a startup packet.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pgbouncer - 1.5.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pgbouncer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.5-1').
